text1: It was more than a decade ago that Pizzaria was created in Lisbon, thus meeting a public that likes pizzas.
text2: Today as before, quality is always a priority and all the ingredients used are fresh. Combining experience, simplicity and the freshest ingredients, we cook delicious meals daily for you with home delivery.
text3: Every day we open our doors with one purpose, that all customers have a quick and great quality meal.
text4: To continue to improve our service, help us to be better and better and meet your expectations.
